name: defillama-mcp_get_protocols
description: List all protocols on defillama along with their tvl

name: defillama-mcp_get_protocol__by_protocol
description: Get historical TVL of a protocol and breakdowns by token and chain

name: defillama-mcp_get_v2_historicalChainTvl
description: Get historical TVL (excludes liquid staking and double counted tvl) of DeFi on all chains

name: defillama-mcp_get_v2_historicalChainTvl__by_chain
description: Get historical TVL (excludes liquid staking and double counted tvl) of a chain

chain.description: chain slug, you can get these from /chains or the chains property on /protocols

name: defillama-mcp_get_tvl__by_protocol
description: Simplified endpoint to get current TVL of a protocol

name: defillama-mcp_get_v2_chains
description: Get current TVL of all chains

name: defillama-mcp_get_prices_current__by_coins
description:
Get current prices of tokens by contract address
Error Responses:
502: Internal error

coins.description: set of comma-separated tokens defined as {chain}:{address}

searchWidth.description: time range on either side to find price data, defaults to 6 hours

name: defillama-mcp_get_stablecoincharts_all
description: Get historical mcap sum of all stablecoins

stablecoin.description: stablecoin ID, you can get these from /stablecoins

name: defillama-mcp_get_pools
description: Retrieve the latest data for all pools, including enriched information such as predictions

name: defillama-mcp_get_chart__by_pool
description: Get historical APY and TVL of a pool

pool.description: pool id, can be retrieved from /pools (property is called pool)

name: defillama-mcp_get_overview_dexs
description: List all dexs along with summaries of their volumes and dataType history data

excludeTotalDataChart.description: true to exclude aggregated chart from response

excludeTotalDataChartBreakdown.description: true to exclude broken down chart from response

name: defillama-mcp_get_overview_dexs__by_chain
description: List all dexs along with summaries of their volumes and dataType history data filtering by chain

chain.description: chain name, list of all supported chains can be found under allChains attribute in /overview/dexs response

excludeTotalDataChart.description: true to exclude aggregated chart from response

excludeTotalDataChartBreakdown.description: true to exclude broken down chart from response

name: defillama-mcp_get_summary_dexs__by_protocol
description: Get summary of dex volume with historical data

excludeTotalDataChart.description: true to exclude aggregated chart from response

excludeTotalDataChartBreakdown.description: true to exclude broken down chart from response

name: defillama-mcp_get_overview_fees
description: List all protocols along with summaries of their fees and revenue and dataType history data

excludeTotalDataChart.description: true to exclude aggregated chart from response

excludeTotalDataChartBreakdown.description: true to exclude broken down chart from response

dataType.description: Desired data type, dailyFees by default.

name: defillama-mcp_get_overview_fees__by_chain
description: List all protocols along with summaries of their fees and revenue and dataType history data by chain

chain.description: chain name, list of all supported chains can be found under allChains attribute in /overview/fees response

excludeTotalDataChart.description: true to exclude aggregated chart from response

excludeTotalDataChartBreakdown.description: true to exclude broken down chart from response

dataType.description: Desired data type, dailyFees by default.

name: defillama-mcp_get_summary_fees__by_protocol
description: Get summary of protocol fees and revenue with historical data

dataType.description: Desired data type, dailyFees by default.
